name: wger
description: wger is a self-hosted workout, nutrition, and weight tracking manager. It lets users plan routines, log exercises, track calories and body metrics, and generate statistics through a comprehensive fitness-focused web application.

features.title: Exercise Database
features.description: Access a comprehensive library of exercises with descriptions, images, and muscle group targeting

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Log workout sessions and track performance improvements over time with detailed statistics

features.title: Nutrition Management
features.description: Plan meals, track calories, macronutrients, and maintain a food diary for diet goals

features.title: Measurement Logging
features.description: Record body measurements like waist, chest, and arms to track physical changes

features.title: Workout Calendar
features.description: Schedule training sessions and view your workout plan in a calendar format
